content: for System Recovery Boost 3 Statement of Direction: In a future IBM Z hardware system family, the transactional execution and constrained transactional execution facility will no longer be supported. Users of the facility on current servers should always check the facility indications before use. Boost typea z/OS V2R5 z/OS V2R4 z/OS V2R3 z/VM V7R3 z/VM V7R2 z/TPF V1R1 VSEn V6R3 Linux on IBM Z Subcapacity Boost for IPL, Shutdownb Y Y Yc Y Yd Yc Yc N zIIP booste for IPL, shutdown and dump events Y Y Yc N N N N N 268 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical Guide Automation The client’s automation product can be used to automate and control the following System Recovery Boost activities:  To activate and deactivate the eBod temporary capacity record to provide more physical zIIPs for an IPL or Shutdown Boost.  To dynamically modify LPAR weights, as might be needed to modify the sharing of physical zIIP capacity during a Boost period.  To drive the invocation of the PROC that indicates
